Requires a Library Card

Designed for those engaged in international trade and business travel, providing information about the people, economy, transportation, and business culture.  

Visit
Requires a Library Card

Mango is designed to equip you with conversational abilities from the very start. Whether you're learning how to order a pizza or ask when the game starts, Mango immerses you in real, everyday conversations in 60 different language courses and ESL instruction.

Visit
Requires a Library Card

PressReader offers 7000 daily newspapers and magazines from 120+ countries in 60 languages using a computer or mobile app.
